lynbrook.sail.scenario

Class BattleField

  • java.lang.Object
    • lynbrook.sail.scenario.Scenario
      • lynbrook.sail.scenario.BattleField

  • public class BattleField
extends Scenario
    this class is for the scenario in the battle field (fighting scene). It includes the canons and the health bar. It handles key events and updates information.
    Version:
    May 31, 2019
    Author:
    Carol, Period: 3, Assignment: pirateShip, Sources: none
